unnormalised: Electoral reforms are vital for a healthy democracy. Think about strengthening the Election Commission of India like TN Seshan did. Greater transparency in campaign finance, perhaps a limit on anonymous donations even below Rs. 20,000, is crucial. Addressing fake news during elections, like around Onam time, is another area. Voter ID linkage with Aadhaar can be considered alongside stronger data protection. More awareness campaigns, especially in states like Bihar, would also help.
